attributes.action: have criminally charged any MP who has misused their position to collect unjustified allowances at the expense of the British taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As MPs would appear to be unable to grasp the consequences of their greed and complete disregard of the concern of decent, law-abiding British taxpayers the full force of the legal system must be applied to them, as would be the case for anyone else not shielded by parliamentary priviledge.
There must be a full investigation by the Fraud squad into all expense claims made by this grossly overpaid group of individuals, with the results being acted on in the courts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
